title: Vizio's P-Series Quantum TVs offer great picture quality, and for a limited time you can save $300 to $800 on them
text:
The Vizio P-Series Quantum TVs offer excellent image quality at a relatively affordable price for big-screen 4K TVs.

For a limited time, you can get a 75-inch Vizio P-Series Quantum TV for a whopping $800 off the original price.

The 65-inch model is $300 off, so if you want a smaller, more affordable 4K TV, it's a good deal.

The deals will only last until October 3, so it's worth acting quickly if you're interested.

Vizio has been building some of the best TVs for the price over the past few years. In general, the Vizio P-Series has been hailed for its awesome image quality and tons of smart features — and for a limited time, a few of the TVs are on sale.

The P-Series Quantum comes in a few different sizes, and the size you get will dictate your savings. The biggest TV in the series has a huge 75-inch screen, which should be more than big enough for any living room. It also has the biggest discount. You can get the 75-inch Vizio P-Series Quantum TV for $800 off the original price. The discount brings the price down to $1,699.99, which is still pretty expensive, but nonetheless a good deal.

If you want something more affordable, there's also a 65-inch model on sale for $300 off. With the discount, its price drops to $1,099.99, which is fairly reasonable for a TV of this size and quality.

The Vizio P-Series Quantum TVs offer excellent image quality with bright, vivid colors. They also have up to 240 local dimming zones, which will make for deep back levels and a lot of contrast.

The TVs are also smart, thanks to Vizio's SmartCast platform. They're compatible with voice assistants like the Google Assistant and Amazon's Alexa, as well as Apple's smart home system HomeKit. The TVs also support both Chromecast and AirPlay 2, and you can install all your favorite streaming apps and services without the need of a streaming stick.

The deals end on October 3, so if you're interested in one of these TVs, you may want to act quickly.
description: Vizio makes great TV's at a reasonable price. Their P-Series Quantum TVs are some of the brand's top models. Now, you can save up to $800 on the TV.
